Posts.Content: pkmox wrote: I had a double mascectomy on Nov 16th with expanders. I developed an infection and had to have the expanders removed in December. I am still in so much pain in my chest area. It is tight and feels like knots. I'm just wondering if anyone else has experienced this and how long it may last. The doctor just says it is still healing and I have to be patient. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Double Mascectomy pkmox AnnieBird55
